explanation: When cnt == 3 and t is not in s+s, the original code entered the 'elif cnt == 3:' branch but had no corresponding else to print 'No' inside that branch, so the program produced no output. I fixed this by moving the membership check into the elif condition (changing only that one line). That way, if cnt == 3 but t is not in s+s the outer else runs and prints 'No'; if cnt == 3 and t is in s+s the inner block prints 'Yes'.
